content: What is your shady scheme? It must be so dangerous. Can't you hear others scream? Why are you calm? Your greed is endless. You do not feel anything. Your mind is a dull one. Your existence is annoying. It's not my idea of fun. Shut your mouth. Do not say anything more to me. You don't know your business, I can not agree. You never reveal your ambition. Can't put up with your thinking, that's the limit. No more!
author: Galneryus
